definition: to associate (cognitively)/to make an associative connection/mental association/word prediction and auto-complete functions of input method editing programs
abbr. for 聯想集團|联想集团[Lian2 xiang3 Ji2 tuan2]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
Lenovo Group (PRC computer firm)
word association/association of ideas
associative learning
to associate/to think of

sentences.english: This NNC is utilized by way of associative memory.
sentences.chinese: 网络的使用利用联想记忆法则。

sentences.english: Zhang Hong, who is from Beijing, reminds David of his Chines friends.
sentences.chinese: 从北京来的张红使大卫联想到他在中国认识的朋友们。

sentences.english: In remembering, names, for instance, a 13)rhyme association works wonders.
sentences.chinese: 对于记忆，比方说记名字，押韵联想的作用非凡。

sentences.english: Which ONE of the following brand is link to obsolete?
sentences.chinese: 以下哪一个手提电话品牌令你联想是过气？

sentences.english: With the title Open Happiness, the song is an advertisement by association.
sentences.chinese: 这首名为《畅爽开怀》的歌靠的就是“联想”作广告。

sentences.english: What do you want people to associate with your brand?
sentences.chinese: 你希望人们通过你的品牌联想到什么？

sentences.english: The dragons of Japan are water deities, frequently associated with rainfall and bodies of water.
sentences.chinese: 日本的龙是水神，经常让人联想到降雨和水体。

sentences.english: The key feature of AANN is feature extract and noise filtering.
sentences.chinese: 自联想神经网络关键在于特征提取和噪声滤波。

sentences.english: I always associate that song with my visit to Hawaii.; Hearing that song conjures up my trip to Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 听到那支歌我就会联想到我的夏威夷之行。

sentences.english: The color pattern of Anchiornis is reminiscent of living birds.
sentences.chinese: 赫氏近鸟身上的色彩让人联想到现代的鸟类。

sentences.english: We have a wealth of imagination and association, and we hope to get the employer's favor.
sentences.chinese: 我们有丰富的想象力和联想力，希望得到雇主的青睐。

sentences.english: Secondly, the complexity of fully-connected kernel auto-associative memory models is reduced.
sentences.chinese: 对全互连的核自联想记忆模型框架进行了稀疏化改造。

sentences.english: People always connect Xi'an with the Big Goose Pagoda and Terracotta Warriors and Horses.
sentences.chinese: 人们一提到西安就会联想到大雁塔和兵马俑。

sentences.english: Can foreknow , associate one of leaders that will make PC market.
sentences.chinese: 可以预见，联想将成为PC市场的领导者之一。

sentences.english: He wanders into the bypaths of association because the bypaths are delightful.
sentences.chinese: 他在联想的蜿蜒小路上驰骋，是因为这些小路是美的。

sentences.english: Those sophistications forced me to connect things in my life in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 剧中的那些圆滑世故让我联想到现实生活中的事情。

definition: to let one's imagination roam
